content: designed to look simple and not detract from the beauty of your precious baby this bonnet is a hood style bonnet the cable pattern is a great leading line pointing straight at the baby s precious face this bonnet is knit flat on straight needles size 8 5mm and worsted weight yarn the pictured yarn used is knitpicks reverie sizes in your pattern purchase newborn 0-3mths 3-6mths 6-12mths permission is granted to sell finished product download this free pattern here 1 1 https //amandammorse com/free-knitting-pattern-cable-hood/
